那是我们唯一的愿望

translation.en: But now he's got this idea that he wants to stay in Montauk,
translation.zh: 但现在他想要留在蒙托克

translation.en: and you need to convince him that he has to go to college.
Great. Great. I'll sign over the title today.
translation.zh: 很好 我今天就签字转让

translation.en: [Maddie on speaker] So if I can convince him to go to Princeton, I get the car?
translation.zh:
（特斯拉） 所以如果我能劝他去普林斯顿上大学
车就归我了？

translation.en: I don't have to have sex with him anymore?
Aren't you guys gonna ask Maddie about herself?
translation.zh: 你们不打算问问麦迪的情况吗？

translation.en: Oh, uh, Maddie, where are you--? Where are you from?
Um, here, actually. I'm from here.
translation.zh: 实际上 我是当地人

translation.en: Yeah, in fact, she's never-- You've never left, right?
translation.zh:
是的 事实上 她从来没有…
你从未离开过 对吗？

translation.en: Well, it's so beautiful here, I don't blame you.
translation.zh: 这里太美了 我能理解

translation.en: -Mom, you didn't make it. Inez did. -Percy.
translation.zh:
-妈妈 这不是你做的 是伊内兹做的
-珀西

translation.en: Well, the important thing is that it's delicious.
I think the important thing is the truth.
And I haven't been entirely truthful with you all.
translation.zh: 我没有完全对你们说实话

translation.en: I didn't get the dates wrong.
I just wanted to introduce you to them,
translation.zh: 我只是想把你介绍给他们认识

translation.en: but I didn't know how to explain how old you are.
translation.zh: 但我不知道该怎么解释你的年纪

translation.en: who married our high school Spanish teacher.
translation.zh: 他跟我们高中的西班牙语老师结婚了

translation.en: Forty years? And that's how old you are, right?
-[Maddie clears throat] -You guys aren't gonna ask us how we met?
translation.zh: 你们不问问我们是怎么认识的吗？

translation.en: Do you wanna tell them? No, I'll tell them. This is so us.
translation.zh:
你想告诉他们吗？不 我来说
我们就是这样

translation.en: It's actually really random. -Maddie came in to adopt a dog. -Oh!
translation.zh: 其实真的很碰巧 麦迪来领养一只狗

translation.en: Yeah, but I rejected her application because she was totally unqualified.
translation.zh:
对 但我拒绝了她的申请
因为她完全不合格

translation.en: But we still hit it off.
I mean, the first day we met, I had to Mace her,
translation.zh:
我们认识的第一天
我就用防狼喷雾喷了她

translation.en: I'm kidding, I'm kidding. I'm kidding.
We actually have a lot in common. In four years, we'll both be seniors.
translation.zh:
其实我们有很多共同点
四年后 我大四 她四十

translation.en: Oh, I'm so-- Oh, my God, I'm so sorry.
I have to get this, but keep getting to know each other,
translation.zh:
我得接这通电话
你们继续互相了解一下

translation.en: We need to move fast. We're in the middle of dinner.
translation.zh: 我们得快点 我们正在吃饭

translation.en: -What are you having? -Roasted chicken and salad.
She's gonna hate not having hubcaps.
translation.zh: 没有轮毂罩 她会气死的

translation.en: She broke your heart, you break the car, since that's all she cares about.
translation.zh:
她伤了你的心 你就毁掉车
因为她只在乎这个

translation.en: She was just like every other thing in my life:
translation.zh: 她就像我生命中其他所有东西
珀西 你父母在楼下

translation.en: I really don't think they mind.
-Well, can we just talk? God! -Stop. What's--? Ow. Ow! My wrist.
translation.zh:
-我们能谈谈吗？天啊！
-停下来 怎么…我的手腕

translation.en: Because I thought you wanted to have sex with me.
translation.zh: 因为我以为你想和我做爱

translation.en: If there's something I don't know, just tell me.
translation.zh: 如果有我不知道的事 告诉我

translation.en: I want to. Let's do it.
This is what you want? This will make you happy?
translation.zh: 这是你想要的？这会让你开心吗？

translation.en: By the way, your car is in the forest, crushed by a tree.
translation.zh: 对了 你的车在树林里 被树压坏了

translation.en: I had some kind of stupid idea that you actually liked me.
translation.zh: 我还愚蠢地以为你真的喜欢我

translation.en: It is real. I've told you things I've never told anybody.
translation.zh:
是真的 我告诉了你
我从没告诉过别人的事

translation.en: I was just trying to save my house. It wasn't personal.
translation.zh: 我只是想保住我的房子 不是针对你

translation.en: -Percy, I'm sorry. I'm so, so sorry. -You should go, I think.
translation.zh:
-珀西 对不起 我非常抱歉
-我想你该走了

translation.en: The truth is, one day I'll live in Paris or something,
translation.zh:
事实上 将来我会住在巴黎
或之类的地方

translation.en: and I'll come back to visit Montauk and you'll still be here.
translation.zh:
我会回来游览蒙托克
而你依旧会在这里

translation.en: How much money do your parents have?
Why don't you go ask them? I know you guys are close.
translation.zh:
你为什么不去问他们？
我知道你们的关系很好

translation.en: But you're rich, right? You never have to worry about money.
translation.zh:
但你很有钱 对吧？
你永远不用操心钱的问题

translation.en: So my life is amazing, right? I have no problems.
translation.zh: 我的人生很棒 对吧？我没有烦恼
我快要失去我的房子了

translation.en: And I don't have a rich dad that can help me.
translation.zh: 我没有一个有钱的爸爸帮我
事实上 你有 麦迪

translation.en: And you're gonna waste your life in that house
translation.zh: 而且你会浪费一辈子在那栋房子里

translation.en: waiting for him to come back and apologize.
Because that's really why you never made it past New York, right?
translation.zh:
因为那就是你到了纽约
就回头的原因 对吧？

translation.en: Well, your name's on the title. It's your car.
translation.zh: 车主是你的名字 这是你的车

translation.en: What am I supposed to do with a car that doesn't run?
translation.zh: 我要一辆开不了的车做什么？

translation.en: These things are built to last.
You don't get to tell me what to do anymore. I'm the parents now.
translation.zh:
你们没资格对我指手画脚了
现在我是家长

translation.en: What other stuff have you been doing for me I don't know about?
translation.zh: 你们还为我做了什么我不知道的事？

translation.en: That time I beat you in basketball, did you let me win?
translation.zh:
那次我打篮球赢了你
你是不是故意让我赢的？

translation.en: No. You beat me fair and square.
translation.zh: 不是 你光明正大地打败了我

translation.en: The kid who bullied me. Did you have him expelled?
translation.zh:
那个霸凌我的小孩
你们让学校把他开除了吗？

translation.en: No. I was told it was a dream of his to go to military school.
translation.zh: 没有 我听说他的梦想是进军校

translation.en: Okay. Whatever this is, it's done.
translation.zh: 好吧 不管是什么 都结束了

translation.en: You can't track me anymore. I'm changing my phone passcode.
translation.zh:
你们再也不能追踪我了
我要改掉手机密码

translation.en: Okay, this is exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.zh: 好吧 这就是我想说的

translation.en: I know you're trying to help me, but you're not.
translation.zh:
我知道你们想帮我
但你们这样不是帮我

translation.en: You have to let me fail or succeed on my own.
translation.zh: 你们得让我自己失败 或者成功
好了 你们可以走了

translation.en: -I'm not getting in that car. -Get in.
[Sara] To Maddie. You figured it out.
translation.zh: 敬麦迪 你想出办法了

translation.en: Yeah. I mean, that car's a little banged up.
translation.zh: 是啊 虽然那辆车有点破

translation.en: Whatever, the summer's over. We got our town back.
translation.zh:
无所谓了 夏天过去了
我们的小镇又归我们了

translation.en: And we can still have Thanksgiving at my place.
translation.zh: 我们还能在我家过感恩节

translation.en: Sara has something to tell you.
-We're gonna move to Florida, I think. -What?
translation.zh:
-我想我们会搬去佛罗里达州
-什么？

translation.en: I know, I know, we wouldn't if we didn't have to.
translation.zh:
我知道 如果不是迫不得已
我们不会搬的

translation.en: You know that. I don't wanna move to Florida.
translation.zh: 你知道的 我不想搬去佛罗里达

translation.en: We just can't afford to buy our own place here.
translation.zh: 只是我们买不起这里的房子

translation.en: And we can't keep staying with Jim's parents when the baby comes.
translation.zh:
而且宝宝出生后
我们不能继续住在吉姆父母家

translation.en: -They only have one bathroom. -Can't believe this.
translation.zh:
-他们家只有一间卫生间
-真不敢相信

translation.en: We're really out of options. I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 我们真的别无选择了 对不起

translation.en: -[Jim] Yeah. We wanna stay. -Don't be mad.
translation.zh:
-是啊 我们想留在这里
-别生气

translation.en: I'm not mad. I just... I can't believe you're leaving.
translation.zh:
我没生气 我只是…
我不敢相信你们要走了

translation.en: Well, I can't believe you're staying.
translation.zh: 我不敢相信你要留下来

translation.en: Oh. You know what, I just-- My buddy's in the bathroom.
I just mean that... I don't know.
How long are you gonna keep doing this?
Having sex for Buicks? This is probably it.
translation.zh: 为了别克和别人做爱？可能就这一次

translation.en: I did what I needed to do to save my mom's house, okay?
translation.zh:
我只是做了我必须做的事
才能保住我妈的房子 好吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You keep saying that, but your mom wanted you to be happy.
translation.zh:
对 你总是这么说
但你妈妈希望你幸福

translation.en: I should tell you I go back to the city tomorrow morning.
translation.zh:
我应该告诉你
我明天一早就要回城里了

translation.en: Oh, tomorrow? Can't you go any sooner?
What is this? A finger trap? I used to love these things.
translation.zh:
这是什么？指铐？
我以前很喜欢这种东西

translation.en: So do you live in the city?
Have you been out here for the whole summer or...?
translation.zh: 你整个夏天都在这里 还是…

translation.en: I was trying to get to know you.
Come on, close them. Give me your finger.
translation.zh: 快点 闭上眼睛 把手指给我

translation.en: -[grunts] Stop pulling on it! -This was a gift from a friend.
Ow! Ow. Ow. Don't pull it, don't pull it, don't--
You have to push in to get out.
That was kind of weird, huh?
[Maddie] Doug. It's Maddie. I wanna sell.
translation.zh: 道格 我是麦迪 我想卖房子

translation.en: [Maddie] Don't get too excited. There's a catch.
translation.zh: 别太激动 有个条件

translation.en: Well, he won't return my calls or texts. Will you tell him I came in?
translation.zh:
他不回我的电话和短信
你能告诉他我来过吗？

translation.en: Yeah. You fucked up. He's a special guy.
translation.zh: 对 你搞砸了 他很特别

translation.en: "My name is Jody and I'm a registered..."
Remember when I said I've made some powerful friends nannying?
translation.zh:
记得我说过 我当保姆
认识了一些有权势的朋友吗？

translation.en: That includes the Suffolk County tax assessor.
translation.zh: 其中包括萨福克县的税务评估员

translation.en: And they're gonna make your property taxes go up.
translation.zh: 他们会提高你的物业税

translation.en: Sorry, can I actually use your bathroom? It's number two, so...
translation.zh:
抱歉 能借用一下洗手间吗？
是大号 所以…

translation.en: He'll be at the Princeton mixer later.
translation.zh: 他待会要参加普林斯顿交流会

translation.en: [man] And there are several eating clubs to choose from,
translation.zh: 有好几个饮食俱乐部可以选择

translation.en: if you make it to junior year. [laughs]
translation.zh: 如果你升上三年级的话

translation.en: [laughs] I can't wait to be eaten at Princeton.
translation.zh: 我等不及去普林斯顿大学被吃掉了

translation.en: I don't owe you anything. I don't owe you anything.
You made me realize I needed to push in to get out.
translation.zh:
你让我明白
我需要审视内心 才能走出来

translation.en: I was hurt. So I hurt people.
translation.zh: 我受过伤 所以我伤害别人

translation.en: Percy, unlock the door. Come on, open the door.
translation.zh: 珀西 开门 快点开门

translation.en: Get off the hood. I don't want anything to do with you.
translation.zh:
从引擎盖上下来
我不想与你有任何牵扯

translation.en: I'm not getting off until you talk to me.
translation.zh: 你不和我谈 我就不下来

translation.en: Then I guess we're doing this.

translation.zh: 嘿 好的 小心 该死

translation.en: This is scary. I can't believe you did this.
translation.zh: 太吓人了 我不敢相信你这么做了

translation.en: No! Not until you believe me that I care about you.
translation.zh: 不！除非你相信我在乎你

translation.en: You lied to me just so you could get a fucking car.
translation.zh: 你欺骗我 就为了得到一辆该死的车

translation.en: -You don't give a shit about me. -Yes, I do.
Get off the hood of my car!
-I can't see! You're blocking me! -Oh, my God! Percy!
translation.zh:
-我看不见！你挡住我了！
-天啊！珀西！

translation.en: I just got my license and I've already ruined two cars.
translation.zh: 我刚拿到驾照就已经毁了两辆车了

translation.en: The Buick's not ruined. I fixed it up.
translation.zh: 别克没被毁掉 我把它修好了

translation.en: It just needed a little love.
My grandfather shot himself in that Buick.
translation.zh: 我爷爷是在那辆别克里开枪自杀的

translation.en: You're lucky I came back for you.
translation.zh: 你很幸运 我回来找你了

translation.en: Where would you be without me?
translation.zh: 没有我 你会在哪里？

translation.en: I'd definitely still be a virgin.

translation.zh: 你依旧是个处男 高手

translation.en: Well, you can tell your friends in college whatever you want.
translation.zh: 你跟你大学的朋友想怎么说都行

translation.en: What do you mean? We're friends.
translation.zh: 什么意思？我们就是朋友啊

translation.en: I think we're probably gonna come back out for Thanksgiving.
translation.zh: 我想我们可能会回来过感恩节

translation.en: I sold the house. I'm moving to California.
translation.zh: 我把房子卖了 我要搬去加州了

translation.en: What are you, some kind of wise Buddha?
translation.zh: 你是什么？充满智慧的菩萨？

translation.en: I'm older than you. You're gonna be okay.
translation.zh: 我比你大 你会过得很好的

translation.en: Am I being executed? Is that the surprise?
translation.zh: 我要被处决了吗？那就是惊喜吗？

translation.en: Yeah, no. This is good news.
You're not blindfolding me to tell me you're having an affair?
translation.zh:
你蒙上我的眼睛
不会是要告诉我 你有外遇了吧？

translation.en: Instead of selling it to some rich asshole,
translation.zh: 与其卖给某个有钱的混蛋

translation.en: I decided to sell it to you guys.

translation.zh: 对 一个普通的混蛋

translation.en: Who had to sell one of the boats.
No, we can. And she could've gotten more for it.
translation.zh: 不 我们买得起 她本来能卖更多钱的

translation.en: This is how we stay. This is what we wanted.
translation.zh:
我们可以留下来了
这是我们想要的生活

translation.en: Oh, my God. Oh, my God.
Oh, right, the thing you made.
translation.zh: 对了 你做的那个东西

translation.en: -There it is. -Should we put it up?
-[Sara] Mm-hm. -We will do that. We're gonna do it as soon as you leave.
translation.zh: 我们会的 你一走 我们就把它挂起来

translation.en: Well, I guess this is it.
-Call us as soon as you get there, okay? -Or don't. Totally fine either way.
translation.zh:
-一到就给我们打电话 好吗？
-或者不打 都行

translation.en: -Are you guys gonna be okay? -[Laird] Yeah. Yeah.
Yeah, come on. Get out of here, you.
-And we love you so much. -Love you too, huh?
-Sure you don't want help with the bags? -No, I got it.
translation.zh:
-确定不需要帮忙拿行李吗？
-不用 我能行

translation.en: -All right. All right, guys. See you. -Bye, sweetie.
translation.zh:
-好了 爸妈再见
-再见 亲爱的

translation.en: Oh, we're talking, buddy. All the way to Princeton.
translation.zh: 我们要说话 伙计 一路聊到普林斯顿

translation.en: Then I'm gonna call you for my whole drive to California.
translation.zh:
然后我开车去加州的一路上
都会和你通电话

translation.en: Tell you about my new boyfriend.
He's had some drug addiction in the past.
Do you want to meet him?
Well, he really wants to meet you. Come on!
translation.zh: 它真的很想见你 来吧！
